cache_dir.desc: Path for storing pre-trained models downloaded from s3.

data_dir.desc: Input directory for downstream task. Should contain train + test (+ dev) files.

output_dir.desc: Output directory where model predictions and checkpoints will be saved.

cuda.desc: CUDA flag,  uses CUDA if available.

local_rank.desc: If local_rank == -1 -> multiGPU mode on one machine,  other values signal distributed computation across several nodes (apex install required).

fp16.desc: Floating point precision. IF true it halves the precision and therefore the memory requirements,  so you can doulbe the batch size.

loss_scale.desc: Loss scaling to improve fp16 numeric stability. Only used when fp16 set to True. 0 (default value): dynamic loss scaling. Positive power of 2: static loss scaling value.

server_ip.desc: Can be used for distant debugging.

server_port.desc: Can be used for distant debugging.

do_eval.desc: Whether to run eval on the dev set.

do_train.desc: Whether to run training. Can be used to only evaluate on an already trained model.

dev_size.desc: Split a dev set from the training set using dev_size as proportion.

model.desc: Bert pre-trained model selected in the list: bert-base-uncased,  bert-large-uncased,  bert-base-cased,  bert-large-cased,  bert-base-multilingual-uncased,  bert-base-multilingual-cased,  bert-base-chinese.

prediction_head.desc: Kind of prediction head we use on top of Language Model

lower_case.desc: Set to true if you are using an uncased model.

max_seq_len.desc: The maximum total input sequence length after WordPiece tokenization. 128 was too short for some texts

balance_classes.desc: Balance classes using weighted CrossEntropyLoss. Original train set from GermEval18 is skewed and the final evaluation is macro averaged,  so we need to balance for optimal performance..

learning_rate.desc: The initial learning rate for Adam.

warmup_proportion.desc: Proportion of training to perform linear learning rate warmup for. E.g.,  0.1 = 10%% of training.

epochs.desc: Total number of training epochs to perform.

batch_size.desc: Total batch size for training for single GPU v100. If using multiGPU, the total batch size will be automatically adjusted.

gradient_accumulation_steps.desc: Number of updates steps (batches) to accumulate before performing a backward/update pass.

embeds_dropout_prob.desc: Strength of dropout to be applied to the word embeddings generated by the language model.

layer_dims.desc: Dimensions of the prediction head. Needs to be of type String, otherwise it gets iterated over.

eval_every.desc: Steps per training loop (batches) required for evaluation on dev set. Set to 0 when you do not want to do evaluation on dev set during training.

mlflow_url.desc: Mlflow server for tracking experiments (e.g. http://80.123.45.167:5000/)

mlflow_nested.desc: Nesting mlflow experiments. For doing multiple runs across a set of hyperparameters.

mlflow_run_name.desc: Name of the particular run for mlflow
